items.name: papUrl
items.title: PAP Full URL
items.tooltip: Please add your PAP URL here (e.g. https://www.your-pap-url.com)

items.name: accountId
items.title: Account ID
items.tooltip: Please add your PAP Account Id here. The default value of account id is default1

items.name: urlParameter
items.title: Affiliate ID Parameter
items.tooltip: Enter URL parameter name for 'Affiliate ID' that you have set in your PAP account's configuration->URL Parameter Names

items.name: papScript
items.title: PAP Script
items.tooltip: Please copy and paste PAP script here. Do not include any script tags in this section. Only insert code enclosed between script tag.

items.name: debug
items.title: Debug Post Affiliate Pro Connection
items.tooltip: When this option is activated, the debug message will be thrown on the screen when initiating a connectiong with Post Affiliate Pro
